summary: This bill, the "Stop Chinese Communist Prying by Vindicating Intellectual Safeguards in Academia Act of 2025" (Stop CCP VISAs Act of 2025), aims to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act. It proposes prohibiting the admission of Chinese nationals as nonimmigrant students (under F, J, or M visas) for the purpose of conducting research or pursuing a course of study. The bill explicitly targets Chinese nationals and seeks to restrict their access to educational opportunities in the United States, citing intellectual property concerns.
